backend/main.mo: Main actor defining stock prediction and news article storage with query/update methods for fetching predictions by symbol/ID/time range, storing predictions/articles, and making HTTP outcalls to fetch news from Google News API.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that initializes predictionData map with sample stock predictions for 6 major Indian stocks (SBIN, TCS, INFY, HDFC, RELIANCE, ICICIBANK) when upgrading from old actor state to new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: fixing prediction data retrieval logic and expanding stock autocomplete list to 100+ NSE stocks, with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing their functionality and recent updates for stock prediction UI.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH-based color system for light/dark modes including financial market colors (bullish/bearish/neutral) and component-specific CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script import for the React application titled 'Stock Market Predictor'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for homepage (/) and prediction results page (/prediction/$symbol), wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/ContributingFact: Card component displaying three contributing factors (news sentiment, institutional flow, chart patterns) with progress bars, icons, and color-coded metrics based on bullish/bearish/neutral indicators.
frontend/src/components/FiiDiiChart.tsx: Recharts line chart component visualizing FII and DII net investment flows over time from the last 30 predictions with tooltips showing buy/sell volumes.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header, footer, and outlet for nested routes. Includes branding, navigation link, disclaimer, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/NewsArticlesList: Displays a list of up to 10 news articles with title, source, date, content preview, and sentiment badge. Shows loading skeletons or empty state when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/NewsSentimentBad: Badge component that displays sentiment (Positive/Negative/Neutral) based on a numeric score with color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/PredictionCard.t: Card displaying stock prediction details including movement direction (bullish/bearish/neutral) with icon, confidence level progress bar, prediction score, and timestamp.
Line chart component using Recharts to visualize prediction scores over time with pattern annotations and interactive tooltips showing confidence and detected patterns.
frontend/src/components/StockSearchBar.t: Search input with autocomplete dropdown for stock symbols, handles form submission and suggestion selection with keyboard navigation support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching stock predictions, news articles, and historical data from the backend actor with proper dependency management.
Provides a custom hook for stock symbol autocomplete with a hardcoded list of NSE stocks across banking, IT, energy, automobiles, pharmaceuticals, FMCG, metals, and other sectors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, financial-specific colors (bullish/bearish/neutral/warning), chart colors, and typography utilities for financial data display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section featuring stock search bar and four feature cards highlighting news sentiment, FII/DII tracking, chart patterns, and AI predictions.
frontend/src/pages/PredictionResultsPage: Displays detailed stock prediction results including prediction card, contributing factors, FII/DII chart, price chart with patterns, and related news articles for a given stock symbol.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, financial-specific color tokens, custom border radius, font families, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file for a stock predictor AI website that aggregates data from NSE India, Moneycontrol, Economic Times, and news sources to predict stock movements using sentiment analysis, FII/DII data, and chart patterns. Currently has issues with prediction data not loading correctly and missing stocks in search autocomplete.
